text: Bruno Alexander Spoerri (born 16 August 1935) is a Swiss jazz and electronic musician. Bruno was born in Zurich, and studied psychology. He plays the saxophone and the electric saxophone. In 1978 he published his first album, Voice of Taurus.Bruno Spoerri website, "Biography of Bruno Spoerri", computerjazz.ch, accessed 17 January 2014. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss musicians Category:Jazz musicians Category:Saxophonists Category:People from ZÃ¼rich
